name: Gravimetric Sensors
desc: The Idoneus Fleet uses unconventional sensors that rely on graviton tracking. Modifies range of ballistic and energy weapons to be closer to 600 su by 50 percent. Also increases sensor range by 20 percent.

name: Reverberation Dampeners
desc: Reduces damage from collisions and kinetic damage by 75 percent. Does not apply to shields.

name: Graviton Deflector
desc: Deflects oncoming ordnance. Most effective with low flux. Disabled during venting, phasing, and while ship systems are active.

name: Triangulation Relay
desc: Increases the range of ballistic weapons by 100 su for each ship in the fleet.

name: Gravity Anchor
desc: Allows the ship to be immobilized.

name: Nutrition Resynthesis Annex
desc: Reduces personell supply usage by 50 percent.\n[Bonus not shown in tooltips]

name: Munitions AutoFac
desc: Refills one ordnance point worth of ammo every %s/%s/%s/%s seconds. The weapon with the least remaining ammo is refilled first.

name: Tactical Ansible
desc: Regenerates command points. Each controlled command relay increases the rate of command point regeneration by 200 percent.
